node.title: 3. What's to Confess
node.description:
One of the more shocking statements on revival suggests some—perhaps many—members of the church feel perfectly right when they don’t have a single ray of light from Jesus—they are laodicean to the core. In studying confession, we discover there is more to confess than we realized!

 

For PDF series guide, click here: 

http://www.path2prayer.com/article/1192/revival-and-holy-spirit/books-sermons/new-resources/discipleheart#RevivalNowBentonHarbor
